name: Pi.intCast_apply
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
π : ι → Type u_2
inst✝ : (i : ι) → IntCast (π i)
n : Int
i : ι
⊢ Eq (↑n i) ↑n
decl:
theorem intCast_apply (n : ℤ) (i : ι) : (n : ∀ i, π i) i = n :=
  rfl

name: Pi.intCast_def
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
π : ι → Type u_2
inst✝ : (i : ι) → IntCast (π i)
n : Int
⊢ Eq ↑n fun x => ↑n
decl:
@[simp]
theorem intCast_def (n : ℤ) : (n : ∀ i, π i) = fun _ => ↑n :=
  rfl

name: Sum.elim_intCast_intCast
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
γ : Type u_3
inst✝ : IntCast γ
n : Int
⊢ Eq (Sum.elim ↑n ↑n) ↑n
decl:
theorem Sum.elim_intCast_intCast {α β γ : Type*} [IntCast γ] (n : ℤ) :
    Sum.elim (n : α → γ) (n : β → γ) = n :=
  Sum.elim_lam_const_lam_const (γ := γ) n
